msg
After the Houkai explosion, Sister and I stayed here for a chance to survive. We once lost the hope of living when we saw the once thriving city turned into an inferno of the walking dead.
在崩坏爆发后，我和姐姐大人在这里寻求着最后的生机，看着原来生机磅礴的都市变成行尸走肉的地狱，一度失去了生存的希望…
崩壊による爆発後、私とお姉ちゃんはここで生きるすべを探し求めたの。けど、以前まで活き活きとしていた都市がゾンビだらけの地獄に変わって、一瞬で生きる望みを失ったんだ……。
붕괴로 인한 폭발 후, 나와 언니는 여기서 살아갈 방법을 찾아 헤맸어. 하지만 이전까지 생기 넘치던 도시가 좀비로 가득한 지옥으로 변해버려, 순간 살아갈 희망을 잃었지…….

After the explosion caused by the Honkai, Bronya and I tried to find a way to survive here. But the once vibrant city turned into a zombie-filled hell, and we lost all hope of survival in an instant...
After the collapse erupted, my sister-sama and I sought our last chance of survival here, watching the original vibrant city turn into a hell of walking corpses, once losing hope of survival...

After the explosion caused by the collapse, my sister and I tried to find a way to survive here. But we lost hope in an instant when the previously vibrant city turned into a zombie-infested hell. ......
msg
But we didn't give up. Thanks to Sister, I understand the meaning of life and I should not forgo my rights to live. That's why I held myself together.
但是我们没有放弃，多亏了和姐姐大人在一起，是她告诉了我生命的重要，不要轻易舍弃自己活着的权利，才让我重新振作了起来。
でも、私たちは諦めなかったの。お姉ちゃんと一緒にいたおかげで、命の大切さを教えてもらえた。軽々しく自分が生きる権利を捨ててはいけないって。それで私はもう1度立ち上がれたの。
하지만 우린 포기하지 않았어. 언니와 함께 있었기 때문에 생명의 소중함을 배울 수 있었어. 함부로 자신이 살아갈 권리를 버려서는 안 된다는 걸. 그래서 난 다시 한 번 일어설 수 있었지.
But still, we didn't give up. Being with her taught me the importance of life, that we shouldn't just throw away our right to live. That's what helped me stand up again.
But we didn't give up, thanks to being with my sister-sama, who told me the importance of life and not to give up my right to live so easily, to get me back on my feet.
But we didn't give up. Thanks to being with my sister, she taught me the value of life. That I should not throw away my right to live lightly. That's how I was able to stand up again.
msg
We built a stronghold under this station. At first, there were only Sister and I in this little cabin, but time went by, we found more and more people as our family.
我们在这个车站下面搭建了据点，起初是只有我和姐姐大人两个人的小屋，后来慢慢找到了更多幸存的家人，我们才渐渐变成现在的样子。
そして、私たちはこの駅の下に拠点を作ったの。最初は私とお姉ちゃん2人だけの小屋だったけど。それからゆっくりと生存者の家族を見つけて、だんだんと今みたいになっていったんだ。
그리고 우린 이 역 아래에 거점을 만들었어. 처음에는 나와 언니 단 둘만의 오두막이었지만. 그 다음부터 서서히 생존자 가족들을 찾아내어, 점점 지금처럼 변해갔지.

So we set up a base below this station. At first it was just my sister and I in a shack. Then, slowly we found other surviving family members and gradually we became what we are today. (TN: Reply to previous note - By "二人", it means "the two of us". It's referring to Bronya and Seele herself, not Sin.)
We set up our stronghold under this station, at first a hut with just my sister-sama and I. Then we slowly found more surviving family members and we gradually became what we are now.
